item.description:
Hey Everyone!

I'm starting up my monthly Meet & Greet at the Diesel Cafe, open to all - a chance to meet up with some members have a coffee or a bite and talk scooters. We try to take over the spots right out front with as many scooters as possible, and I'll tell ya.. 10 scoots all lined up looks pretty cool. There are always interested folks who come around to ask - a good opportunity for sponsors to talk about what they sell.

A ride following is optional depending on the weather and how tired folks are, if we ride it will be at 6:30 while there's a little light, an easy ride as a big group around the area depending on what folks are up for. We will try it out on Tuesday and see how it goes, or move it next month to accommodate if Monday's are bad for lots of folks.

There is a chance of rain on Tuesday, if it is a sure bet - I'll postpone on Monday.

Here's the link to the WEATHER in somerville

Hope to see you there!

Paul
item.name: Monthly Meet n' Greet
